title: Natural Capital Accounting Integration: Cross-Sectoral Systems Map
description: Include ecosystem services (₹125L Cr/year) in national GDP accounting

nodes.label: Biodiversity
nodes.description: Natural Capital Accounting: Ecosystem services in GDP (₹125L Cr/year)

nodes.label: Urban Development
nodes.description: Infrastructure planning, cost-benefit analysis, policy evaluation

nodes.label: Industry
nodes.description: Corporate reporting, supply chain impacts, natural capital risk

nodes.label: Water
nodes.description: Watershed services, water purification, flood control

nodes.label: Air Quality
nodes.description: Carbon sequestration, air filtration, climate regulation

nodes.label: Food & Agriculture
nodes.description: Pollination, soil formation, pest control services

links.quantification: Natural capital in GDP → infrastructure BCAs include ₹125L Cr ecosystem costs → ₹50K Cr destructive projects rejected
Corporate accounting → ₹100K Cr natural capital liabilities disclosed → investor risk assessment improves → ₹20K Cr green finance shift
Watershed services valued → ₹40L Cr/year water purification recognized → forest conservation investment justified
Carbon accounting → 300 MT/year sequestration = ₹30L Cr value → deforestation costs internalized
Pollination services → ₹20L Cr/year value explicit → agricultural biodiversity protection incentivized
Liability exposure: Natural capital accounting reveals ₹50K Cr corporate damages → industry opposes disclosure requirements
GDP integration → policy priorities shift → conservation budgets increase → ecosystem health improves (reinforcing)
Requires valuation standards: Accounting only credible with SEEA framework adoption → ₹5K Cr data infrastructure prerequisite
Via forest value: Watershed accounting → city water supply protection prioritized → ₹10K Cr upstream conservation investments
Via pollinator value: Accounting → farmer biodiversity stewardship payments → ₹5K Cr rural income support justified
Via carbon pricing: Sequestration value → deforestation carbon tax ₹10K/ton → logging sector costs internalized
Via recreation value: Cultural services (₹8L Cr/year) recognized → community park investments justified → green access improves
